ygData.subject: Re: Spellcasting Weapons vs. Bard Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: No, only if YOU use it, and only when it goes off. Geoffrey is working on a fix for this as soon as he gets back from E3, so I m thinking inside a week or so,
ygData.messageBody:
No, only if YOU use it, and only when it goes off.

Geoffrey is working on a fix for this as soon as he gets back from E3, so
I'm thinking inside a week or so, that'll be a non-issue.

----- Original Message -----
From: Douglas Bierbower <Bierbower@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 6:22 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Spellcasting Weapons vs. Bard Songs


>From: Douglas Bierbower <Bierbower@...>
>
>If someone in my party is using a Granite Tomahawk, will it disrupt my
songs? I
>will look for this effect this evening.
>
>
>> I remember reading this somewhere. Any weapon that cast a spell when you
>> hit will also mess up your bard songs. So stuff like the Granite
Tomahawk
>> and the screaming mace are absolute no nos to bards.
>
>
>
>
